DOC.brief_title: Effect Antenatal Steroid Pulmonary Artery Blood Flow
DOC.detailed_description: After internal review board approval , 126 consecutive patient attend antenatal care clinic Kasr Alainy Hospital , part Cairo university hospital recruit study . All patient sign inform consent . Patients include study 20-38 year age , indication elective caesarean section . Patients exclude hypertensive , diabetic disorder may aggravate administration steroid , woman systemic infection include tuberculosis sepsis , fetal congenital anomaly ( affect fetal heart , lung , circulation ) , history rupture membrane , suspect chorioamnionitis , intrauterine growth retardation ( IUGR ) , intrauterine fetal demise ( IUFD ) . Patients randomize 37 week 6 day gestation nurse attend clinic use computer generate randomization table , close envelope system use . Patients equally divide two group . Patients group ( A ) receive two dos 12mg betamethasone ( Dipropfos Â® SCHERING-PLOUGH ; Kenilworth , New Jersey , USA ) intramuscularly ( IM ) 24 hour apart , group ( B ) patient receive saline placebo injection regimen . Ultrasound examination do patient lie semi-recumbent position , ultrasound perform expert ultrasonographer , expert training fetal echocardiography . The ultrasound specialist blind study arm patient belongs . The abdominal probe ultrasound machine ( voluson730 ; kretz , Zipf , Austria ) place fetal chest transverse section , give u four chamber view fetal heart . The color Doppler switch , fetal pulmonary artery identify . The measurement take middle segment pulmonary artery first bifurcation pulmonary branch ( cross aortic arch ) . We obtain measurement either right left pulmonary artery , whichever easy accord fetal position , difference value obtain either accord work do Rasanen et al . The pulsatility index ( PI ) , resistance index ( RI ) , systolic/diastolic ratio ( SD ) , acceleration-time/ejection-time ratio ( At/Et ) determine case recruitment , administration drug ( betamethasone / placebo ) , 24 hour last dose , day elective Cs . Caesarean section perform 7 day last dose betamethasone , senior neonatologist attend birth , document Apgar score , neonatal respiratory distress . A sample size calculate difference mean pulsatility index ( PI ) administration antenatal steroid middle segment fetal pulmonary artery 0.42 previous study Bartha et al , standard deviation set 0.79 . The Type I error probability set 0.05 , power 80 % . This give u 57 patient arm , allow dropout rate 10 % , 63 patient recruit arm study , ratio study control 1:1 . PS Power Sample size Calculations software , Versionv2.1.30 MS Windows , use calculate sample size Dupont Vanderbilt , USA ) .
